section.name: Introduction
section.p: Describing how to write your own Astrogrid-compatible webapps is beyond the scope of these documents, but this page is intended to give you an idea of which components of the PAL libraries or webapps can be replaced by your own components.

section.name: Changing table writers
section.p: For when you want to add, transform or remove columns in result sets, or if you want to add new output formats

section.name: SQL generators
section.p: For when you have a SQL RDBMS that requires a particular flavour of SQL not already provided in PAL.

section.name: Data querier plugins
section.p: For when you have data that is not in an RDBMS, such as some special local data format
